channel.title: Object for changing Musical Keys
channel.description: I have a patch I thought I'd expand. In this patch I use a few musical keys both in Maj and min etc but its using quite a few objects. If I was to have a much larger selection of keys, e.g. up to 32, is there an object like this suitable already, so I can just scroll through?

item.title: Object for changing Musical Keys
item.dc:creator: @trimardius
item.description:
@trimardius wrote:

The library of SirSickSik should be very helpful for this:
Sss/harmony directory contains great objects for scales , temperaments and keys and lots more...

Read full topic

item.title: Object for changing Musical Keys
item.dc:creator: @EarthTemple M
item.description:
@EarthTemple wrote:

I have a patch I thought I'd expand. In this patch I use a few musical keys both in Maj and min etc but its using quite a few objects. If I was to have a much larger selection of keys, e.g. up to 32, is there an object like this suitable already, so I can just scroll through?

Read full topic
